import React, { useState } from "react"; import { confirmAlert } from "react-confirm-alert"; import "react-confirm-alert/src/react-confirm-alert.css"; import "./style.css"; import { userInfo } from "os"; const Form = props => { return ( <>
setFirstName(e.target.value)} placeholder="First name" type="text" name="firstName" required />
setLastName(e.target.value)} placeholder="Last name" type="text" name="lastName" required />
); }; export default Form;
